channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BiggerNews: Multifamily Market Update + Where to Find Deals NOW
item.description: Multifamily real estate is still offering some significant opportunities to investors—you just need to know where to look! Although the past two years have been rough for multifamily, with falling […]

item.title: Apple cuts iPhone price in India amid China slowdown
item.description: Apple has reduced prices of its iPhone models in India by 3-4% following a cut in import duties in the South Asian market. The price cuts range from 300 rupees ($3.63) for models like the iPhone 13, 14 and 15, and to up to 6,000 rupees ($72.54) for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Raymond and Cassanda
item.description: Raymond Flanks spent nearly 39 years in Louisiana lockups for a murder he didn’t commit. Luckily, he found love with an old friend, Cassandra Delpit.

item.title: Rookie Reply: What EVERY Rookie Must Learn Before Investing in Real Estate
item.description: Not quite ready to invest in real estate? Maybe you’re still getting your finances in check or saving for a bigger down payment. In any case, don’t sit on your […]

item.title: Egypt’s MNT-Halan banks $157.5M, gobbles up a fintech in Turkey to expand
item.description: MNT-Halan, a fintech unicorn out of Egypt, is on a consolidation march. The microfinance and payments startup has raised $157.5 million in funding and is using the money in part to fund the acquisition of another fintech, Tam Finans, to expand into Turkey. Tam Finans provides financing to micro-enterprises and SMEs. It currently operates 39 […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Problem With Labeling Trump a ‘Felon’
item.description: Here’s why language used to describe any person convicted of crimes matters, and affects more than the former president.

item.title: Is FIRE Dead? No, But Here’s Why Most WON’T Achieve It
item.description: Is the FIRE movement dead? In 2024, more people are catching on to the huge downsides of pursuing financial independence, retire early. Strict frugality, massive sacrifice, working harder than ever…is […]

item.title: Energy tech startup Greenely grabs €8M to reach more households and support Europe’s energy transition
item.description: The energy transition is a marathon, not a sprint. But opportunities for acceleration are growing. Swedish startup Greenely* has just spotted one. It’s closing an €8 million Series A funding round to expand its energy management platform into neighbouring Nordic countries (so around $8.7M at current exchange rates). The energy tech startup is serving around […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Photos: Three Years of a Family’s Grief and Healing After a Fatal Police Shooting
item.description: Photographer Michael Indriolo documents an East Cleveland family’s search for peace after the 2021 police shooting of their 19-year-old brother.

item.title: 6 Ways to Raise Rent While Respecting Your Residents
item.description: Raising rental rates is part of the industry. It can’t be avoided. Whether you’re a solo investor or looking for compassionate, effective property management, this is how to raise rent with respect and keep your properties occupied and producing revenue.

item.title: Luxury fashion startup The Floorr empowers personal stylists with tools to grow their businesses
item.description: The Floorr offers tools for conducting sales, hosting tailored styling sessions, creating mood boards, and engaging in text or voice chats with clients, all in one place. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Sending Unarmed Responders Instead of Police: What We’ve Learned
item.description: There are more than 100 response teams nationwide, but experts say more research on their impact is needed.

item.title: National Rent Control, Falling Mortgage Rates, and Fleeing Homebuyers
item.description: A new nationwide rent control proposal could cap rent increases for any landlord with a certain amount of properties. But will it actually pass? How would landlords survive when rents […]

item.title: Here’s why David Sacks, Paul Graham and other big Silicon Valley names had a brawl on X over VC behavior
item.description: A decade-old drama involving VC David Sacks and Rippling founder Parker Conrad has blown up on X with many among the Silicon Valley elite taking sides. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Marshall Project Launches Investigate This!
item.description: Our toolkits will offer data, storytelling and engagement resources to empower more criminal justice reporting in local communities
